overview: Amazon has become one of the most powerful corporations in the world, and only the second company ever to be valued over US$1 trillion. This film investigates its strategies, inner workings and ideologies and asks whether the services that we have become so dependent on could eventually cost us our hard won freedoms, and how one of the worldâ€™s most trusted brands has influenced our individual behaviour, labour force and culture.
title: In Amazon We Trust
